hero.title: Ukunika amandla ezingqondweni, Ukubumba ikusasa
hero.subtitle: Regisbridge Private School - Isikole esihlukile sosuku nokuhlala eZimbabwe

about.title: Mayelana neRegisbridge
about.subtitle: Ifa Lokuhle Ekufundiseni
about.description: Regisbridge Private School ibinikeza imfundo ephakeme iminyaka engaphezu kwamashumi amabili, ihlanganisa ubunzima bezifundo nokuthuthukiswa komuntu endaweni enakekelayo.
about.missionText: Ukunikeza imfundo ephelele ethuthukisa ukufuna ukwazi, ubuqotho, namakhono obuholi kubafundi bethu.
about.visionText: Ukuba yisikhungo esihamba phambili semfundo eZimbabwe, esaziwa ngobuhle bezifundo nokuthuthukiswa komuntu.

academics.title: Ubuhle Bezifundo
academics.subtitle: Ikharikhulamu Ephelele Yempumelelo
academics.description: Ikharikhulamu yethu ihlanganisa ikharikhulamu yeCambridge International nezidingo zendawo, iqinisekisa ukuthi abafundi balungiselelwe amathuba endawo nawamazwe ngamazwe.

boarding.title: Ukuphila Kokuhlala
boarding.subtitle: Ikhaya Kude Nekhaya
boarding.description: Izindawo zethu zokuhlala zinikeza indawo ephephile enakekelayo lapho abafundi bethuthukisa ukuzimela, umthwalo wemfanelo, nobungani bempilo yonke.

footer.description: Regisbridge Private School - Ukunika amandla ezingqondweni, ukubumba ikusasa kusukela ngo-2000.
